attributes.action: Up our tax free amount by 12% from 12500 to 14000
attributes.additional_details: Change tax free amount from 12500 to 14000
attributes.background: With rising costs a fair movement going forward would be to up the tax free amount by 12% which will help those struggling the most in our society.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: 

Raise the income tax personal allowance to £15000 immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617227
